overview: A dark drama where hopeless naivety wars with emotional resilience in the life of Gloria, a London waitress. Always selfless and looking for the good in people, Gloria attempts to juggle a woeful love life with the endless demands of a dysfunctional family, oblivious to her link to an unsolved murder. As the investigation reaches a climax, Gloria learns that caring can be a dangerous game.
title: Goodnight, Gloria
